title: Fact Check: This video of a boy washing apples in sewage water is OLD | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus outbreak, a video of a boy washing apples in sewage water is being shared on social media.

At the time of filing the report, the above post had around 11 K shares on Facebook.

NewsMobile fact-checked the video and found that it is old.

We extracted the keyframes of the video and put them through Reverse Image Search. In results, we found a YouTube link to the same video that was uploaded on September 23, 2018.

NewsMobile independently couldn’t identify the origin of the video but from the above information, it is clear that the video is old.
